system.description: Packed into sealed, self-contained cylinders, IPS-N’s “Roland Rounds” are high-explosive anti-armor charges built for kinetic weapons of any mech-scale caliber. Loaded in place of inert kinetic ammunition, a Roland HE/AA shell increases the efficacy and destructive power of any weapon it is fired from.
system.effect:
When you reload any weapon, your next attack with a Loading weapon gains this effect:
On hit: This attack deals +1d6 explosive bonus damage, and targets must succeed on a Hull save or be knocked Prone.
